response.raw:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
Dear Parents and Colleagues,

We are excited to announce a new initiative to enhance our students' learning experiences through focused, complex play. To facilitate this, we are seeking parent volunteers and older students to participate in various classroom activities.

Parent Volunteers:
• Assist with small group activities
• Lead stations during center time
• Share expertise in specific areas (e.g., art, music, science)
• Help organize and supervise outdoor play

Older Student Mentors:
• Buddy reading with younger students
• Assist with math games and problem-solving activities
• Guide younger students in hands-on science experiments
• Support creative writing projects

If you are interested in volunteering or know an older student who would like to mentor, please contact the school office for more information and to schedule your participation.

Thank you for your support in enriching our students' educational journey.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
Elementary School Teacher
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
